numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph demonstrates that younger women are more likely to reach out to their parents than young men.
2. I wonder why younger women are more likely to reach out to their parents than young men.
3. Parenting styles may explain this difference.
4. How children were brought up may explain this difference.
5. Human adaptation may explain this difference.
6. Some humans grow away from their closest family.
7. I wonder how accurate this graph is in our community.
